SEARCH
Package com.platform.auth.api

Class PasswordAuthController

java.lang.Object
com.platform.auth.api.PasswordAuthController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/auth") @ConditionalOnProperty(name="app.auth.password.enabled", havingValue="true") public class PasswordAuthController extends Object
REST API controller for password authentication endpoints. Only enabled when password authentication is configured.
